an8.64:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava gayayam viharati gayasise.
an8.64:1.3: “pubbaham, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samano obhasanneva kho sanjanami, no ca rupani passami.
an8.64:2.2: ‘sace kho aham obhasanceva sanjaneyyam rupani ca passeyyam;
an8.64:2.3: evam me idam nanadassanam parisuddhataram assa’ti.
an8.64:3.1: So kho aham, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami, rupani ca passami;
an8.64:3.2: no ca kho tahi devatahi saddhim santitthami sallapami sakaccham samapajjami.
an8.64:4.2: ‘sace kho aham obhasanceva sanjaneyyam, rupani ca passeyyam, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santittheyyam sallapeyyam sakaccham samapajjeyyam;
an8.64:4.3: evam me idam nanadassanam parisuddhataram assa’ti.
an8.64:5.1: So kho aham, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami, rupani ca passami, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santitthami sallapami sakaccham samapajjami;
an8.64:5.2: no ca kho ta devata janami—
an8.64:5.3: ima devata amukamha va amukamha va devanikayati.
an8.64:6.2: ‘sace kho aham obhasanceva sanjaneyyam, rupani ca passeyyam, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santittheyyam sallapeyyam sakaccham samapajjeyyam, ta ca devata janeyyam:
an8.64:6.3: “ima devata amukamha va amukamha va devanikaya”ti;
an8.64:6.4: evam me idam nanadassanam parisuddhataram assa’ti.
an8.64:7.1: So kho aham, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami, rupani ca passami, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santitthami sallapami sakaccham samapajjami, ta ca devata janami:
an8.64:7.2: ‘ima devata amukamha va amukamha va devanikaya’ti;
an8.64:7.3: no ca kho ta devata janami:
an8.64:7.4: ‘ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena ito cuta tattha upapanna’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.6: ‘ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena ito cuta tattha upapanna’ti;
an8.64:7.7: no ca kho ta devata janami:
an8.64:7.8: ‘ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena evamahara evamsukhadukkhappatisamvediniyo’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.10: ‘ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena evamahara evamsukhadukkhappatisamvediniyo’ti;
an8.64:7.11: no ca kho ta devata janami:
an8.64:7.15: no ca kho ta devata janami yadi va me imahi devatahi saddhim sannivutthapubbam yadi va na sannivutthapubbanti.
an8.64:8.2: ‘sace kho aham obhasanceva sanjaneyyam, rupani ca passeyyam, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santittheyyam sallapeyyam sakaccham samapajjeyyam, ta ca devata janeyyam:
an8.64:8.3: “ima devata amukamha va amukamha va devanikaya”ti, ta ca devata janeyyam:
an8.64:8.4: “ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena ito cuta tattha upapanna”ti, ta ca devata janeyyam:
an8.64:8.5: “ima devata evamahara evamsukhadukkhappatisamvediniyo”ti, ta ca devata janeyyam:
an8.64:8.6: “ima devata evamdighayuka evamciratthitika”ti, ta ca devata janeyyam yadi va me imahi devatahi saddhim sannivutthapubbam yadi va na sannivutthapubbanti;
an8.64:8.7: evam me idam nanadassanam parisuddhataram assa’ti.
an8.64:9.1: So kho aham, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami, rupani ca passami, tahi ca devatahi saddhim santitthami sallapami sakaccham samapajjami, ta ca devata janami:
an8.64:9.2: ‘ima devata amukamha va amukamha va devanikaya’ti, ta ca devata janami:
an8.64:9.3: ‘ima devata imassa kammassa vipakena ito cuta tattha upapanna’ti, ta ca devata janami:
an8.64:9.4: ‘ima devata evamahara evamsukhadukkhappatisamvediniyo’ti, ta ca devata janami:
an8.64:9.5: ‘ima devata evamdighayuka evamciratthitika’ti, ta ca devata janami yadi va me devatahi saddhim sannivutthapubbam yadi va na sannivutthapubbanti.
an8.64:10.1: Yavakivanca me, bhikkhave, evam atthaparivattam adhidevananadassanam na suvisuddham ahosi, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
an8.64:10.2: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, evam atthaparivattam adhidevananadassanam suvisuddham ahosi, athaham, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim;
an8.64:10.4: akuppa me cetovimutti; ayamantima jati natthi dani punabbhavo”ti.
